title: PeopleDB Py React
summary: Person database using flask and react
content:
This is a react frontend web application to control / modify users in a database.

 Check out http://ppldb-py-react.ssebs.com/ and http://ppldb-py-react.ssebs.com.

title: React ToDo Cookies
summary: This is a todo app that saves your todos in localStorage ("cookie"), so you can "save" it.
content: This is a todo app that saves your todos in localStorage ("cookie"), so you can "save" it.

title: jwt-example
content:
This repo contains sample code to get basic JWT working with React and Flask.

The frontend code is in the root dir, and the backend code is in the _backend dir.

title: Galeri
summary: Web app that helps raise awarness to internal projects
content: CMS that allows creating a web page for each project within an organization to raise awareness. The system has to be usable such that non-technical people will have no diffulties.

title: New Hire Form
summary: php/python form to send emails for IT team for onboarding
content:
Form to start the IT processes for creating an account, configuring a machine, setting up a phone, etc.

Current project is in Docker, with files in src/, templates/, & bin/ directory.

When submitting the form, a YAML file gets output in the usr-yml/ directory.

Emails are sent out to helpdesk, one for each item needed

title: timecard
summary: Simple timecard app with basic authentication
content: Simple timecard app with basic authentication

title: Clean MAC Address
summary: GUI program to clean a mac address (F01898b4EA08 -> f0:18:98:b4:ea:08)
content:
GUI program to clean a mac address (F01898b4EA08 -> f0:18:98:b4:ea:08)

Program to "clean" MAC address for registrar input. This is being used in production at PARC, to normalize the MAC address for the RADIUS server inputs.

title: PeopleDB
summary: Manage Users in AD/NIS/Web GUI using PeopleDB.
content:
Web/AD/NIS user management. Web UI running on LAMP server will create/modify/disable Active Directory and NIS accounts. 

>AD & NIS Account creation/modification/disable works.

Plans for future:
1) Clean UI/Fix UX

title: ssebsEngine
content:
Java/LWJGL2 2D Game Engine

ssebsEngine is a simple java 2D game engine that I've been working on since I've been working on games. After I made my games for my CS class, I made the engine so that I could stop copy/pasting the code.

It is free to use and modify.

title: PerishablePunchers
content:
PerishablePunchers is a Mortal Kombat like Game written in Java

Perishable Punchers Game Information

*Game developed by ssebs and Charlse
*Produced by ssebs
*Website: http://ssebs.github.io
*Time to develop: 1 Month
*Release date: 4/23/15
*Written in Java 1.6 Using LWJGL 2
*Custom artwork
*Custom sounds

title: GDXPerishablePunchers
content: GDXPerishablePunchers is Perishable Punchers remade with LibGDX Library. A Version of Perishable Punchers made in LibGDX, mostly so that it works on android.

title: APlatformerOfSomeSort
content: A simple platformer game written in Java.
